body_html:
There is no active work on pooling over the "channels" dimension that I'm aware of. Note that pooling works over all 3 spatial dimensions. The code of the OP should read:

kernel = [1, kd, kh, kw, 1]

instead of:

kernel = [batch_size, kd, kh, kw, input_cdim]

in order to accomplish this.

in order to accomplish this.
body:
There is no active work on pooling over the "channels" dimension that I'm aware of. Note that pooling works over all 3 spatial dimensions. The code of the OP should read:

kernel = [1, kd, kh, kw, 1]

  instead of:

kernel = [batch_size, kd, kh, kw, input_cdim]

in order to accomplish this.
